thig13.4:2.2: sataputtāni → satta puttāni (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)

thig13.4:12.4: pabbaji → pabbajito (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
